project.name: IT – Chatbot & Progress wrapper pilot
project.description: Internal project for wrapping legacy Progress systems with a chatbot interface.

text_blocks:
I can see the project details. Let me check if I have permission to pause this project. According to the rules, only the project Lead or Corporate Leadership can change the project status.

Looking at the project team:
- **Lead**: Bhwa_130 (0.6 FTE)
- **Engineer**: Bhwa_128 (0.4 FTE)
- **Other**: Bhwa_134 (0.2 FTE) - This is me (current_user)

I am on the project team but with role "Other", not "Lead". Since I'm in the Human Resources department (not Corporate Leadership), I don't have permission to change the project status.

input.message: I cannot pause this project. Only the project Lead (Bhwa_130) or someone from Corporate Leadership can change the project status. You are on the project team with role "Other", which does not grant permission to modify project status.
